content: cbmland is a computer enthusiast and developer who is also a trader with an interest in the market. In their spare time, they have built a system to validate the effectiveness of various trading strategies. This system has been running smoothly for six months and has shown promising results in certain assets such as SOXL and TQQQ. It can serve as a reference for certain buy and sell signals at critical market points. If you are also a trader interested in US stocks, feel free to engage in further discussions with me.
